channel.title: Tensorflow Lite on Pallavi Ramicetty
channel.description: Recent content in Tensorflow Lite on Pallavi Ramicetty

item.title: 2 - Device Based Models With Tensorflow Lite
item.description: We've seen a lot of deep building algorithms run maybe on our system and on the Cloud, but there's something magical to getting these algorithms. Maybe a model that we've trained to run in your hand, on our smartphone or on a lightweight embedded processor like, an Arduino Raspberry Pi. TensorFlow Lite, an exciting technology that allows us to put our models directly and literally into people's hands.

item.title: Tensorflow: Data and Deployment Specialization at Coursera
item.description: Maybe we have trained a model in Jupyter Notebook or in our system, but how do we take that model and have it be running 24/7, have it serve actual user queries, and create value? This course will teach us how to do all that using TensorFlow.
